blueprint.description: Installs Ultimate Plumber (a tool for writing Linux pipes with instant live preview) on Linux or macOS
blueprint.overview: up, which is short for [Ultimate Plumber](https://github.com/akavel/up), is a tool for writing Linux pipes in a terminal-based UI interactively, with an instant live preview of command results.
blueprint.name: Ultimate Plumber (up)
blueprint.title: Ultimate Plumber (up)
